snippet.title: Top 6 Unmissable Museums In Amsterdam
snippet.description:
Top 6 Unmissable Museums In Amsterdam
Toegevoegd door dm_519c8d06ac036 laatste juli
Top 6 Unmissable Museums-Rijksmuseum-collections of paintings of Dutch Golden Age,Stedelijk Museum-it has one of the richest modern art collections in the world,Van Gogh Museum-drew controversies for its artistic choices,Madame Tussauds Wax Museum-Has great line up worldwide celebrities of wax,Tulips Museum-History of tulip and its cultivation is shown here,Anne Frank Museum-Dedicated to Jewish wartime diarist Anne Frank,http://www.joguru.com/amsterdam-netherlands/
8 views

snippet.title: Neues Rotlicht-Museum in Amsterdam eröffnet
snippet.description:
Neues Rotlicht-Museum in Amsterdam eröffnet
Toegevoegd door Zoomin.TV Österreich laatste februari
Amsterdam ist bekannt für sein Rotlichtviertel. In einem neuen Museum, dem 'Red Light Secrets', können Touristen nun einen Blick hinter die Kulissen des Geschäfts mit der Lust werfen.
7 views

snippet.title: Portrait of Rembrandt's wife on show at The Amsterdam Museum
snippet.description:
Portrait of Rembrandt's wife on show at The Amsterdam Museum
Toegevoegd door euronews-en laatste juli
For the first time, a portrait of Rembrandt's wife can be seen in a Dutch museum. The painting, dated around 1635, is currently on loan from the National Gallery of Art in Washington to The Amsterdam Museum. Rembrandt's wife, Saskia van Uylenburg, was 29 when she died.http://www.euronews.net/
49 views

snippet.title: Porno als kunst in Amsterdams museum
snippet.description:
Porno als kunst in Amsterdams museum
Toegevoegd door Zoomin.TV Vlaanderen 2 jaren geleden
Vanaf 14 april vertoont het Stedelijk Museum in Amsterdam een mythologische pornofilm van de jonge kunstenaar Stefan Ruitenbeek. Niemand minder dan Kim Holland leverde de modellen.
669 views

snippet.title: Amsterdam welcomes back Van Gogh in renovated museum
snippet.description:
Amsterdam welcomes back Van Gogh in renovated museum
Toegevoegd door Euronews laatste mei
After being closed for seven months, Amsterdam's Van Gogh Museum is welcoming visitors with a new exhibition. A 20-million euro revamp was undertaken while the building complied with strict fire safety regulations in the Netherlands, meaning guests can enjoy new works in a new surrounding....http://www.euronews.net/
27 views

snippet.title: Van Gogh Museum Moves to Amsterdam
snippet.description:
Van Gogh Museum Moves to Amsterdam
Toegevoegd door tvnportal vorig jaar
Amsterdam's Van Gogh Museum is closed for restoration but don't worry the Dutch painter's masterpieces are being showcased at the Hermitage Amsterdam till the month of April. And after Cranach's Three Graces, the Louvre is appealing once more to the generosity of the public for the purchase of an ivory figurine to complete an exceptional medieval ensemble: 800,000 euros are needed...Powered by NewsLook.com Producer : France24
39 views

snippet.title: Amsterdam Tattoo Museum geopend
snippet.description:
Amsterdam Tattoo Museum geopend
Toegevoegd door Zoomin.TV Nederland 2 jaren geleden
Voor tattookoning Henk Schiffmacher kwam zaterdag een droom uit. Hij opende zijn eigen tattoomuseum in Amsterdam. Het museum is elke dag geopend.
61 views

snippet.title: The Van Gogh Museum - Amsterdam , Netherlands
snippet.description:
The Van Gogh Museum - Amsterdam , Netherlands
Toegevoegd door theworldoftravel 2 jaren geleden
he Van Gogh Museum is an art museum in Amsterdam , Netherlands , featuring the works of the Engels painter Vincent van Gogh and bis contemporaries. It has the largest collection of Van Gogh's paintings and drawings in the worldThe main exhibition chronicles the various phases of Van Gogh's artistic life. Highlights[citation needed] include The Potato Eaters, Bedroom in Arles, and one of the three Sunflowers paintings with a yellow background, Still Life: Vase with Twelve Sunflowers.[citation needed] The museum also features notable paintings by Van Gogh's contemporaries in the Impressionist and post-Impressionist movements and holds extensive exhibitions on various subjects from 19th Century art history.[5] [edit] The building The main structure was designed by Gerrit Rietveld and opened in 1973. The architect of the 1999 Exhibition Wing was Kisho Kurokawa SOURCE : WIKIPEDIA 
130 views
